ing: 1/2 pound bacon strips, cooked and crumbled
2 medium tomatoes, seeded and finely chopped
1 (0.53 ounce) package McCormickÂ® French Onion Dip Seasoning Mix
des: "How do you better a BLT? Turn it into a dip. With five easy ingredients--bacon, mayo, sour cream, tomatoes and McCormickÂ® French Onion Dip Seasoning Mix--you can whip up this dip before the big game starts. Load it on to toasted bread or crackers and discover for yourself why Charleston is so beloved for bacon."
ins:
Mix all ingredients in large bowl until well blended. Cover.
Refrigerate until ready to serve.
